    • actionCancel

      void actionCancel(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Goes back to appointmentView.fxml
      Parameters:
      event - when the cancel button is selected
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs while loading the appointment view FXML scene

    • actionSaveAppt

      void actionSaveAppt(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws SQLException, IOException
      Saves a new appointment to the database with the provided details and loads the appointment view FXML scene.
      Parameters:
      event - when the save button is clicked
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an error occurs while accessing the database
      IOException - If an error occurs while loading the appointment view FXML scene

    • saveAppointment

      private void saveAppointment(String startUTC, String endUTC)
      Save an appointment in UTC format to the database
      Parameters:
      startUTC - a string representation of the start date/time in UTC format
      endUTC - a string representation of the end date/time in UTC format
